verses.name: 1 Kings 4:12
verses.text: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth–shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth–shean to Abel–meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:13
verses.text: The son of Geber, in Ramoth–gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:14
verses.text: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:

verses.name: 1 Kings 4:15
verses.text: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
